channel.title: Please can we all move on
channel.description:
i am afraid to say we all need to move on from our fun times on 317's and stuff...
we need to start using and coding 503's and 508's.
this is a chance to code the latest runescape stuff. and atm the coding for these is very basic. only 20% range has been acheived and pprobably less then 10% mage.
so if every1 moved onto these then we could all benefit from it.
+ it is teh closes to runescape that this community has ever had.

item.title: Please can we all move on
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

[quote=“Rubiks Cube, post:30, topic:227986”][quote author=00rYn00 link=topic=299616.msg2406147#msg2406147 date=1219716161]

i agree with the guy who posted this… i think we should move on… learn something more.

BUT I ALSO THINK ALL OF YOU SHOULD SHUT THE FUCK UP AND STOP BLABBERING OVER STUPID SHIT LIKE EVERYONE ALWAYS DOES! THIS COMMUNITY IS CORRUPT WITH DUMB ASSES THAT FLAME AND OTHER STUPID SHIT. “WRONG SECTION” WHO GIVES A FUCK!!! ARE YOU TRYING TO GET MOD OR SOMETHING? JUST ANSWER THE FUCKING QUESTION EVEN THOUGH IT IS IN THE WRONG SECTION… IS IT REALLY THAT BIG OF A DEAL? AND NOW DONT SAY “WELL HES TRASHING THE FORUM” SO FUCKING WHAT? THATS NOT YOUR FUCKING JOB TO CLEAN IT UP. THERE ARE PPL FOR THAT JOB.

GOD DAMN.

yeah i’m probly being a hipocrit here, but i totally agree with you… lol
well i mean we should say wrong section for further notice, but still answer the question and then remind them to put it in the right section,
and the way i read things, i read everything with a tone that i put, and that was actually pretty funny
[/quote]

lol ok. well like most ppl are pircks about shit like WR0NG 53C710N!!! FUCK OFF! lol seriously calm down… who cares if its in the wrong damn place. and i think even saying to read the rules is unnecessary cuz. “it matters why??” if he keeps posting there just reply to him. they will eventually get moved or something.[/quote]

First of all, you should calm down.

Second, Do you have any idea how annoying it is when you’re looking for some help in the tutorial section, and you keep looking and then you come across a lot of topics that are just saying things like

OMG, FUCK THIS SITE, GO TO MY SITE AT..

Do you have any idea how frustrating that is? That’s probably the leading cause of ‘Flame’ on these forums.

Read full topic
item.source: Please can we all move on

item.description:
@00rYn00 wrote:

well yeah her attitude is a bitch… i mean her motto is “Always one step ahead of the rest”, well really? did she MAKE moparscape to begin with? and did she MAKE the 503 servers? lol no… all she did was put the frosting on the bacon…

for those of you that don’t understand my metaphor "She added something sweet to something bitter, such as adding the new cache for graphics when still most servers can’t handle ALL of the items and use them correctly…

for those that don’t know what a metaphor is… well i just feel sorry for you

item.title: Please can we all move on
item.dc:creator: @00rYn00 00rYn00
item.description:
@00rYn00 wrote:

[quote=“hasumon, post:23, topic:227986”][quote author=00rYn00 link=topic=299616.msg2406063#msg2406063 date=1219713851]

but… people sell the things all the time?

Blasphemy!

@_Vengeance: Is Silabsoft in her cage yet?

I actually laughed at that post… but still I mean we need to finish working on our 317 - 400 clients and servers, I mean if we cant fix major bugs in those servers, how the fuck do you expect us to fix it in the 503’s??
I mean seriously, sure it would awesome if everyone would work on the 500 clients, but they are (as Vengance said) still the same old shit… new cache…
[/quote]
Who the fuck are you? o_0[/quote]

I’m your dad…

[quote=“WrittenBlade, post:24, topic:227986”][quote author=00rYn00 link=topic=299616.msg2406063#msg2406063 date=1219713851]

but… people sell the things all the time?

Blasphemy!

@_Vengeance: Is Silabsoft in her cage yet?

I actually laughed at that post… but still I mean we need to finish working on our 317 - 400 clients and servers, I mean if we cant fix major bugs in those servers, how the fuck do you expect us to fix it in the 503’s??
I mean seriously, sure it would awesome if everyone would work on the 500 clients, but they are (as Vengance said) still the same old shit… new cache…
[/quote]
I’m glad you see my humor.

@_Vengeance: Silabsoft needs to be in her cage at all times. I’m assiging you responsibility to assure me she stays in that cage.[/quote]

yeah no problem… but i just thought it was funny because people bag on her so much for totally pwning everyone…

Read full topic
